name: Wangan Warrior X
description:
Wangan Warrior X is a modernized realistic take on street-racing games that were only available in cabinets at arcades. Players can customize and tune their car with a wide variety of options and parts. Once you're ready to roll, take your ride through traffic at speeds up to 200 MPH/320 KMH on different levels of Japan's highway systems against rivals of all kinds. As you work your way up you can unlock more parts, rewards, paintjobs, and more.

Become a Wangan Warrior today!
